NetworkProperty.Name: VelocityFromExternalSources
NetworkProperty.Description: Velocity of applied from other sources

NetworkProperty.Name: SecondsSinceOnGround
NetworkProperty.Description: Number of seconds since the player was last on the ground

NetworkProperty.Name: SecondsSinceJumpRequest
NetworkProperty.Description: Number of seconds elapsed without a jump button press

NetworkProperty.Name: OnGround
NetworkProperty.Description: Tracks whether or not the player is currently on the ground

NetworkProperty.Name: WasOnGround
NetworkProperty.Description: Tracks whether or not the player was previously on the ground in the last tick

NetworkProperty.Name: IsJumping
NetworkProperty.Description: Tracks whether or not the player is still executing a jump

RemoteProcedure.Name: ApplyImpulse
RemoteProcedure.Description: Applies an impulse directly to the players self generated velocity

Param.Name: External
Param.Description: If true, the impulse will be applied to the external velocity, and if false it will be applied to internal velocity

RemoteProcedure.Name: SetVelocity
RemoteProcedure.Description: Directly sets the self generated velocity to the provided value, overriding any current velocity values

Param.Name: External
Param.Description: If true, the impulse will be applied to the external velocity, and if false it will be applied to internal velocity

ArchetypeProperty.Name: WalkSpeed
ArchetypeProperty.Description: Walk speed, units in meters per second

ArchetypeProperty.Name: SprintSpeed
ArchetypeProperty.Description: Sprint speed, units in meters per second

ArchetypeProperty.Name: ReverseSpeed
ArchetypeProperty.Description: Reverse speed, units in meters per second

ArchetypeProperty.Name: CrouchSpeed
ArchetypeProperty.Description: Crouching speed, units in meters per second

ArchetypeProperty.Name: MaxJumpHeight
ArchetypeProperty.Description: Max vertical jump height in meters

ArchetypeProperty.Name: JumpPressQueuedSeconds
ArchetypeProperty.Description: How long in seconds before touching the ground that a jump can be triggered once the ground is reached.

ArchetypeProperty.Name: JumpOnGroundQueuedSeconds
ArchetypeProperty.Description: How long in seconds after falling off the ground that a jump can still be triggered.
